channel.title: Dadmother - ᚨᛚᚠᚨᛞᚺᛁᚱ (Alfadhir) [black metal/hardcore/punk]
channel.description:
I’ve been working on a track lately that has been a true test of my attention to detail in terms of leveling and “controlled chaos”. It’s got elements of back metal, doom metal, hardcore, and crust punk. ᚨᛚᚠᚨᛞᚺᛁᚱ, the Elder Futhark runic spelling of “Alfadhir” or “all-father”, is one of the many names given to Odin. His two ravens, Huginn and Muninn, inspired the artwork. This track also features a small bit of vocals, courtesy of me screaming in my bedroom 5 feet or so away from my iPhone. 😬
Here’s what I’ve got so far of [ᚨᛚᚠᚨᛞᚺᛁᚱ](https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/wip) ![image|500x500](upload://kTAWruS5su8MBzoXdywH5NP60Lc.jpeg)

item.title: Dadmother - ᚨᛚᚠᚨᛞᚺᛁᚱ (Alfadhir) [black metal/hardcore/punk]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Terrifyingly savage, in the best way possible. Looking forward to the finished product!
